A recipe for challah

April 2022

I‚Äôve been experimenting with dough variation, choosing a more pastry-style dough instead of something that‚Äôs traditionally bready.

Baking bread, to me, can instantly turn into failure if what I taste three hours later isn‚Äôt as fluffy and fresh as it was when it came out of the oven. Julia Turshen‚Äôs recipe for jam buns turns out to be perfect for challah. I still use the braiding technique from Gefilteria, and substitute half of Julia‚Äôs butter for olive oil to add some extra fluff. It‚Äôs heaven.
